summary: Just Shuri and Peter Quoting Vines at the Old Guys
title: Just Shuri and Peter Quoting Vines at the Old Guys
body:
Chapter Three

Peter and Shuri were tossing a ball of paper back and forth, waiting for Tony to come down to the lab and give them access to all the lab features. He’d learned early on that giving them full lab access usually meant that they would blow something up without supervision just for fun.

Peter accidentally threw wide and hit Dum-E, who whirred annoyedly at him. Peter grinned and said, “What’d you say?”

“He said, ‘whoever threw that paper, your mom’s a ho!’”

The boy laughed as Dum-E shook his claw at him, whirring again with emphasis. “It’s okay, Dum-E. I know you didn’t. It’s a vine, buddy.” He patted his claw comfortingly.

Tony walked in and eyed the three warily. “Are you tormenting my bot?”

“No!”

“We would never.” Shuri smirked.

Chapter Two 

@patyreadee @tralfazziod @remorse–less

Let me know if you want to be tagged in future chapters!

summary:
“Spider-Man PS4 is downgraded because the devs removed a puddle that was in the E3 demo”
What is it with these nerds getting so...
body:
“Spider-Man PS4 is downgraded because the devs removed a puddle that was in the E3 demo”

What is it with these nerds getting so upset over a minor detail of a game that is barely a month away from release? Even the developer also stated the scene lighting is different because it’s set in a different time of day and that there’s a difference between regular HD and the PS4 Pro 4K and reassures that yes, there is puddles.

You think the way some people are acting, it’s as if this is another Watchdogs scenario where the whole game is false advertising when an old ass E3 demo isnt representing the whole game.

My favourite thing about this is that they use awful compressed screenshots to have a genuine debate on how the game’s visuals have been ‘downgraded’ and people taking piss of the whiners.

At least IGN will like this game, there’s less puddles than Pokemon Alpha Sapphire! Haha!

blog.name: oxymitch
blog.title: Whatever Mitch
blog.description:
I am Mitch of Singapore, also an Ace. I enjoy reading superhero comics (especially Marvel); comic books aren't just for boys, girls read it too. However, I have no interest in any Marvel movie due to my jaded attitude, so I prefer Marvel cartoons like 90s X-Men TAS and Avengers EMH. 
Those Marvel comics I love reading are New Warriors, X-Men, Young Avengers, X-Factor, Avengers (not that Bendis era), Generation X, Avengers Academy and X-Force. 
Big fan of New Warriors and X-Men. 
My Favourite Marvel characters are...GAMBIT (Remy LeBeau), JUBILEE (Jubilation Lee), SPEEDBALL (Robbie Baldwin), WICCAN (Billy Kaplan), JUSTICE (Vance Astrovik), ROGUE (Anna Marie), SPEED (Tommy Shepherd), NIGHTCRAWLER (Kurt Wagner), FIRESTAR (Angelica Jones), QUICKSILVER (Pietro Maximoff), SHE-HULK (Jennifer Walters), QUASAR (Wendell Vaughn) and COSMO the space dog.

summary: Mary Jane Watson was mentioned as one of the victims of a mysterious serial killer. However, to make things even more...
caption:
Mary Jane Watson was mentioned as one of the victims of a mysterious serial killer. However, to make things even more complicated, she was also revived by a mystery man called Jared who magically healed her back to life. While Mary Jane, Elsa Bloodstone and even Jessica Jones (the latter two from the previous issue) were seemingly killed and revived due to popularity power, poor White Rabbit and Skein were not saved from off-panel death. 

- Jessica Jones #2, 2018 (Marvel Digital Original)

summary: Wades been living with Peter for a couple months now and it's pretty great, accept for Peters habit of taking things and blaming...
body:
Wades been living with Peter for a couple months now and it’s pretty great, accept for Peters habit of taking things and blaming it on his pet spider “Todd”.

Wades cereal goes missing: “yeah, sorry about that it’s just Todd, I’ll replace it.”

Wades hoodies go missing: “He tends to burrow when it gets cold, I’ll find his nest and get it back for you.”

“Todd” even stole his game control, because he’s jealous of the attention it gets???

Wade plays along with Pete’s whole “Todd” thing until they’re chilling on the couch one day and a spider the size of a large cat jumps in his lap and starts chittering at him.

“WHAT THE FUCK,” Wades already reaching for a gun, and Peter hasn’t even moved.

“Chill, babe he just wants to change the channel,” which Peter procceds to do while seemingly talking to the giant spider.

“Peter what is on my lap?”

“Todd?”

“Todd is real???”

“No, I made Todd up because I didn’t want to take the blame for being a shitty roommate. Of course Todd’s real!”

“…..honestly I don’t know why I didn’t see this coming.”

blog.description: Hey all! this is a imagine blog! For all sort of fandoms I do take requests. Just know spelling or grammer sucks. Haha love you all!

summary:
Imagine: video calling with your recently New boyfriend Peter parker. 
Where is Peter? You asked all day. To yourself it went...
body:
Imagine: video calling with your recently New boyfriend Peter parker.

Where is Peter? You asked all day. To yourself it went like him to not go to school. And not to answer his phone so after school you went to his place. It wasn’t out of the way, you and Peter live in the same apartment building. So knocking on his door. You weren’t all surprised to see Aunt May.

She flashed a warm smile. You and peter have been best friends since they moved in years ago. Peter even gave you a key to his place. That you solemnly use. Aunt may smiled brightly as she spoke. “Oh hi y/n. Pete isn’t here”

Having an pleasant conversation you nodded your head saying ok. Peter got a internship from Tony Stark? How did that happen? Walking into your apartment you were alone again. So you texted your mom saying you were home. Part of the rules when she works a grave digger shift you have to text when your home. Seeing a text from Stan. Unfortunately Stan is your English partner / wants to be your boyfriend . Hes a great guy minus always smelling of garlic, a rude guy who never says anything nice ever.

Stan: hey want to go get some dinner? I’ll pay for half?

Y/N : No thanks me and peter are going out to get dinner thanks those

You have politely turned him down seven times this week alone. He wasn’t getting the message. Knowing Peter he wouldn’t mind you using him as a excuse.

Hours passed as you were laying in bed watching a movie when your phone rang. You picked it up seeingnif was a video chat from Peter you accepted it and his beautiful face appeared on your screen.

“Hey Y/N I ddint wake you did I?” You shook your head smiling brightly. You couldn’t help it. Lately you been having a hard time controlling yourself around Pete. Butterfly in stomach,blushing any time you see him, always a big smile. You were crushing and you promised yourself not to act on them. Your friendship meant more too you then a possible dating thing. Well you keep saying that on repeat how it would be a bad idea. But you know. You will still day dream and then correct your train of thought about your best friend.

“Luckily for you I am watching star wars. So I was up anyways. I can’t believe you got a internship and didn’t tell me!”

He chuckled loudly laying on a bed he looked wide awake. You shifted to lay down as he spoke. “How was your day?”

“Boring Stan asked me out again. I said we were going out tonight. How about you? Have you met Tony stark yet?”

He smiled brightly reveling a few things. What surprised you was when he started mumbling “God your beautiful.”

You gasped saying what. As he covered his mouth instantly realizing what he said. It caused you too sit up as you asked again. “Did you just call me beautiful?” “Yes . I mean you are.. I just- date me y/n.”

Again you were stunned staring at peter who was white as a ghost. He was uncomfortable and you could tell he was thinking about 20 different ways to other fix this or pretend it didn’t happen. But you bite your bottom lip. “What if it doesn’t work out I dont want to lose you.”

“You wont I swear y/n.” You nodded your head fast smiling brightly . “Ok. When you back?” “Ugh late Sunday.” Hearing a loud bang from his end it made you both jump then hearing a man scream for peter to go to sleep. It only caused you too laugh. Peter turned with a wide smile on his face. “I should probably go to bed but I really dont want to.” Smiling you looked st the boy genius as he spoke. “Night y/n.’

"Night peter ”

She flashed a warm smile. You and peter have been best friends since they moved in years ago. Peter even gave you a key to his place. That you solemnly use. Aunt may smiled brightly as she spoke. “Oh hi y/n. Pete isn’t here”

Having an pleasant conversation you nodded your head saying ok. Peter got a internship from Tony Stark? How did that happen? Walking into your apartment you were alone again. So you texted your mom saying you were home. Part of the rules when she works a grave digger shift you have to text when your home. Seeing a text from Stan. Unfortunately Stan is your English partner / wants to be your boyfriend . Hes a great guy minus always smelling of garlic, a rude guy who never says anything nice ever.

Stan: hey want to go get some dinner? I’ll pay for half?

Y/N : No thanks me and peter are going out to get dinner thanks those

You have politely turned him down seven times this week alone. He wasn’t getting the message. Knowing Peter he wouldn’t mind you using him as a excuse.

Hours passed as you were laying in bed watching a movie when your phone rang. You picked it up seeingnif was a video chat from Peter you accepted it and his beautiful face appeared on your screen.

“Hey Y/N I ddint wake you did I?” You shook your head smiling brightly. You couldn’t help it. Lately you been having a hard time controlling yourself around Pete. Butterfly in stomach,blushing any time you see him, always a big smile. You were crushing and you promised yourself not to act on them. Your friendship meant more too you then a possible dating thing. Well you keep saying that on repeat how it would be a bad idea. But you know. You will still day dream and then correct your train of thought about your best friend.

“Luckily for you I am watching star wars. So I was up anyways. I can’t believe you got a internship and didn’t tell me!”

He chuckled loudly laying on a bed he looked wide awake. You shifted to lay down as he spoke. “How was your day?”

“Boring Stan asked me out again. I said we were going out tonight. How about you? Have you met Tony stark yet?”

He smiled brightly reveling a few things. What surprised you was when he started mumbling “God your beautiful.”

You gasped saying what. As he covered his mouth instantly realizing what he said. It caused you too sit up as you asked again. “Did you just call me beautiful?” “Yes . I mean you are.. I just- date me y/n.”

Again you were stunned staring at peter who was white as a ghost. He was uncomfortable and you could tell he was thinking about 20 different ways to other fix this or pretend it didn’t happen. But you bite your bottom lip. “What if it doesn’t work out I dont want to lose you.”

“You wont I swear y/n.” You nodded your head fast smiling brightly . “Ok. When you back?” “Ugh late Sunday.” Hearing a loud bang from his end it made you both jump then hearing a man scream for peter to go to sleep. It only caused you too laugh. Peter turned with a wide smile on his face. “I should probably go to bed but I really dont want to.” Smiling you looked st the boy genius as he spoke. “Night y/n.’

"Night peter ”

summary:
Me: I love those tuxedo jackets that look like peacoats. Tom Holland wore one to the Oscars and he looks fly.
Roomie: When...
body:
Me: I love those tuxedo jackets that look like peacoats. Tom Holland wore one to the Oscars and he looks fly.
Roomie: When doesn't Tom Holland look fly?
Me: I mean, when he's a spider.
